revisions.rev:
{{Infobox person | name = Peter Facinelli | image = Peter Facinelli cropped.jpg | caption = Peter Facinelli, 2009 | birthname = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1973|11|26}} | birth_place = [[Queens, New York]], U.S. | occupation = Actor | yearsactive = 1995âpresent | spouse = {{marriage|[[Jennie Garth]]|2001||}} 3 children }} '''Peter Facinelli''' (born November 26, 1973)[http://www.filmreference.com/film/56/Peter-Facinelli.html Peter Facinelli Biography (1973-)] is an American actor. He became known as the star of [[Fox Broadcasting Company|Fox]]'s 2002 television series ''[[Fastlane (TV series)|Fastlane]]''. He plays [[Carlisle Cullen]] in [[The Twilight Saga (film series)|the film adaptations]] of the ''[[Twilight (series)|Twilight]]'' series. He is also well known for his role as Mike Dexter in the film ''[[Can't Hardly Wait]]''. He is currently a regular on the television series ''[[Nurse Jackie]]'' portraying the role of Dr. Fitch "Coop" Cooper. ==Early life== Facinelli grew up in [[Ozone Park, Queens]], the son of [[Italian people|Italian]] immigrants, Bruna, a homemaker, and Pierino Facinelli, a waiter.{{cite web|last=Tauber|first=Michelle|url=http://www.people.com/people/archive/article/0,,20138444,00.html|title=Vroom, Vroom!|work=[[People (magazine)|People]]|quote = Given Facinelli's Catholic upbringing, ...|date=2002-11-11|accessdate=2009-08-04}} His parents are from [[Val di Non]] which is located in [[Trentino]], [[Northern Italy]]. His father is from [[RevÃ²]], while his mother is from [[Spormaggiore]].{{cite web|url=http://www.intrentino.to/interne/articoli.aspx?ID=3851&IDA=2054|title=Dalla Val di Non a Hollywood|editor=In Trentino, giornale on-line del Trentino|date=2008-12-19|accessdate=2009-03-17|language=italian}} He was raised [[Catholic Church|Roman Catholic]] and attended [[St. Francis Preparatory School]] in Fresh Meadows, New York.{{cite web|last=Roleke|first=John|url=http://queens.about.com/b/2009/12/24/twilight-star-home-for-the-holidays-in-queens.htm|title=Twilight Star Home for the Holidays in Queens|work=[[About.com]]|quote =|date=2009-12-24|accessdate=2010-06-22}} He studied acting at the [[Atlantic Theater Company]] Acting School in [[New York City]]; his teachers there included [[William H. Macy]], [[Felicity Huffman]], [[Giancarlo Esposito]], and [[Camryn Manheim]]. ==Career== Facinelli made his feature film debut in [[Rebecca Miller]]'s ''Angela'' in 1995 and came to the attention of critics in the TV-movie ''The Price of Love'' later that year. In 1996, Facinelli played opposite future wife [[Jennie Garth]] in ''An Unfinished Affair''. Other TV roles followed, including a part in ''[[After Jimmy]]'' (1996) and a college dropout in ''[[Calm at Sunset, Calm at Dawn|Calm at Sunset]]''. Facinelli co-starred with [[Amanda Peet]] and [[Michael Vartan]] in the 1997 AIDS-themed drama ''Touch Me'' (1997) and co-starred as a high school student in two 1998 features with [[Ethan Embry]] and [[Breckin Meyer]], ''[[Dancer, Texas Pop. 81]]'', and ''[[Can't Hardly Wait]]'', which starred [[Jennifer Love Hewitt]]. Facinelli appeared in the sci-fi film ''[[Supernova (2000 film)|Supernova]]'' starring [[James Spader]] in 2000. He made appearances in ''[[Riding in Cars with Boys]]'' in 2001 and ''[[The Scorpion King]]'' in 2002, followed by a leading role in the Fox drama ''[[Fastlane (TV series)|Fastlane]]''. Facinelli had a recurring role in the HBO series ''[[Six Feet Under (TV series)|Six Feet Under]]'' in 2004 and a role in the [[FX (TV channel)|FX]] original series ''[[Damages (TV series)|Damages]]'' beginning in 2007. Facinelli starred in ''[[Hollow Man 2]]'' with [[Christian Slater]]. It was released [[direct-to-video]] in May 2006. After wrapping up ''[[Finding Amanda]]'' with [[Matthew Broderick]], Facinelli played [[Carlisle Cullen]] in the film adaptation of ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]'', based on the book by [[Stephenie Meyer]].{{cite news |first=Larry |last=Carroll |title='Twilight' Film's First Family Revealed: Peter Facinelli, Elizabeth Reaser Lead Cullen Clan |url=http://www.mtv.com/movies/news/articles/1581728/20080215/story.jhtml |publisher=MTV |date=2008-02-19 | accessdate=2008-02-21 }} Facinelli reprised his role in the sequels of the film, ''[[The Twilight Saga: New Moon]]'',{{cite web |first=Larry |last=Carroll |title=Peter Facinelli Excited To Play Carlisle Cullen Again In 'New Moon' |url=http://www.mtv.com/movies/news/articles/1600318/story.jhtml | publisher=MTV |date=2008-11-26| accessdate=2009-03-12}} and ''[[The Twilight Saga: Eclipse]]''. He will also continue to portray the role in ''The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn'' which is set to release November 18, 2011.{{cite web|url=http://movies.yahoo.com/news/usmovies.accesshollywood.com/cullen-family-stars-sign-breaking-dawn |title=Cullen Family Stars Sign On For 'Breaking Dawn' â Yahoo! Movies |publisher=Movies.yahoo.com |date=2010-05-19 |accessdate=2010-08-15}} He stars as Dr. Fitch Cooper in the [[Showtime (TV network)|Showtime]] [[black comedy|dark comedy]] series ''[[Nurse Jackie]]''.{{cite web |title=''Nurse Jackie'': Official Site |url=http://www.sho.com/site/nursejackie/home.do |publisher=Sho.com |accessdate=2009-03-03}} He will soon star in "Loosies," a story of a New York pickpocket that he wrote himself and being produced by [[Verdi Corrente Productions]].{{cite web|last=Fernandez |first=Jay A. |url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/film/news/e3ie8547ace0ecf6e074ff7edcac6785721 |title=Vincent Gallo, Michael Madsen join 'Loosies' |publisher=Hollywoodreporter.com |date=2010-06-17 |accessdate=2010-08-15}} ==Personal life== Facinelli met his wife, [[Jennie Garth]], on the set of ''[[An Unfinished Affair]]'', a 1996 [[television film]]. They married in 2001. They are parents to Luca Bella (born on June 30, 1997), Lola Ray (born on December 6, 2002), and Fiona Eve (born on September 30, 2006). ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film and Television |- ! Part 1]]'' | Dr. Carlisle Cullen | |- | 2012 |''[[Loosies]]'' | | |- | 2012 | ''[[The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn|The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2]]'' | Dr. Carlisle Cullen | ''Post-Production'' |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.peter-facinelli.com/ Peter Facinelli's Official Website] *{{IMDb name|4906}} *{{amg name|215316}} *{{twitter|peterfacinelli}} {{Persondata |NAME = Facinelli, Peter |ALTERNATIVE NAMES = |SHORT DESCRIPTION = Actor |DATE OF BIRTH = November 26, 1973 |PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Queens, New York]], U.S. |DATE OF DEATH = |PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Facinelli, Peter}} [[Category:1973 births]] [[Category:Actors from New York City]] [[Category:American film actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:American people of Italian descent]] [[Category:American Roman Catholics]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Queens]] [[Category:St. Francis Preparatory School alumni]] [[ar:Ø¨ÙØªØ± ÙØ§ÙØ³ÙÙÙ]] [[cs:Peter Facinelli]] [[da:Peter Facinelli]] [[de:Peter Facinelli]] [[es:Peter Facinelli]] [[fr:Peter Facinelli]] [[hy:ÕÕ«Õ¿Õ¥Ö ÕÕ¡Õ¹Õ«Õ¶Õ¥Õ¬Õ«]] [[hr:Peter Facinelli]] [[it:Peter Facinelli]] [[he:×¤×××¨ ×¤×¦'×× ××]] [[kk:ÐÐ¸ÑÐµÑ Ð¤Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð½ÐµÐ»Ð»Ð¸]] [[hu:Peter Facinelli]] [[nl:Peter Facinelli]] [[ja:ãã¼ã¿ã¼ã»ãã¡ã·ããª]] [[no:Peter Facinelli]] [[pl:Peter Facinelli]] [[pt:Peter Facinelli]] [[ru:Ð¤Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð½ÐµÐ»Ð»Ð¸, ÐÐ¸ÑÐµÑ]] [[sl:Peter Facinelli]] [[fi:Peter Facinelli]] [[sv:Peter Facinelli]] [[tr:Peter Facinelli]] [[vi:Peter Facinelli]]
